!Subclass Skill Certification: Depending on your level, I may able yo certify you subclass. Take this certification to *Avant-Garde, the Wizard of Transformation in the Ivory Tower*, for more information on which skills you wiil be able to aquire. Additionally, you will receive the Transformation Sealbook in lieu of ultimate skills. Now, what level of certification do you want to obtain? [npc_%objectId%_GetCertification65|Level 65 Emergent Skill certification.] [npc_%objectId%_GetCertification70|Level 70 Emergent Skill certification.] [npc_%objectId%_GetCertification75List|Level 75 Master of class-specific certification.] [npc_%objectId%_GetCertification80|Level 80 Divine Transformation certification.]
